feed.title: dep Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest dep news and events.

entry.title: A new dep release, and new docs!
entry.summary: v0.4.0 of dep [has been released](https://github.com/golang/dep/releases/tag/v0.4.0) - and along with it, this site for documentation and announcements about dep! And, being that it's been nearly six months since [the last dep status update](https://
